sys_script_client.description: Actions performed by this script: -Autopopulate the Return Time field -Autopopulate the Center field -Detect if this device is already checked out (if so: notify the user and clear the Device form field) -Detect if a device of the same *exclusive* abstract type is already checked out to this user (if so: notify the user and clear the Device form field)
sys_script_client.name: Form Changes based on Device
